explains: v. 起床；起义；上升（uprise 的现在分词形式）

sentences.en: The late president Ferdinand Marcos was overthrown by a popular uprising in 1986.
sentences.cn: 已故总统费迪南德·马科斯于1986年被民众起义所推翻。

sentences.en: It is true that the publicly acknowledged leaders of an uprising frequently write memoirs.
sentences.cn: 确实，那些公开承认的起义领导人经常写回忆录。

sentences.en: I brought five cabinet members with me to discuss the popular uprising against globalization that we had witnessed in the streets of Seattle.
sentences.cn: 我带了五名内阁成员来讨论我们在西雅图街头目睹的反对全球化的民众起义。
